topics.body:
Hey guys. Mind if I make a small rant? Yes? Too bad! doing it anyway! Then cracking hang-self worthy puns!

I looked into this Ted Anderson drama. I know it makes others mad, and it did me too...but for a different reason. What I found just felt so...irrelevant and inconsequential that it pissed me off people were making a deal about it.
 
Maybe it's cause I'm an avid comic fan and a few scuzball writers and artists are normal for me, so this doesn't seem like that big a deal to me. But knowing this became a drama just irritated me and I need to get it off my chest. 

This is just my opinion and I know others see it very differently, but I had to say this

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5484c32163687270ce700300#post_5484c32163687270ce700300

DOn't you mean..."SEA a dentist"? Oh look. Everyone's pulled out the nooses. ...What have I done?
